UpdateAvailable.paragraph1: A new version of IPLD Explorer is available; <1>please reload</1>.

StartExploringPage.title: Εξερεύνηση - IPLD
StartExploringPage.leadParagraph: Paste a CID into the box to fetch the IPLD node it addresses, or choose a featured dataset.

AboutIpld.paragraph1: <0>IPLD is <1>the data model of the content-addressable web.</1> It allows us to treat all hash-linked data structures as subsets of a unified information space, unifying all data models that link data with hashes as instances of IPLD.</0>
AboutIpld.paragraph2: <0>Content addressing through hashes has become a widely-used means of connecting data in distributed systems, from the blockchains that run your favorite cryptocurrencies, to the commits that back your code, to the web’s content at large. Yet, whilst all of these tools rely on some common primitives, their specific underlying data structures are not interoperable.</0>
AboutIpld.paragraph3: <0>Enter IPLD: a single namespace for all hash-inspired protocols. Through IPLD, links can be traversed across protocols, allowing you to explore data regardless of the underlying protocol.</0>

projects.title: Featured datasets
projects.paragraph1: Explore the featured datasets or paste a CID to see how that data is structured and linked across protocols.

step1.title: Εξερευνητής IPLD
step1.paragraph1: Your journey with IPLD Explorer starts here. Click "Next" to learn more.

step2.title: Breadcrumbs
step2.paragraph1: Η διαδρομή προς αυτόν τον κόμβο.
step2.paragraph2: Click on it to traverse to its parents or children.

step3.title: Πληροφορίες κόμβου
step3.paragraph1: Here you have detailed info about the node and you can open it in the IPFS gateway.
step3.paragraph2: Αν ο κόμβος είναι φάκελος, μπορείτε να δείτε και να περιηγηθείτε στα στοιχεία του.

step4.title: Στοιχεία CID
step4.paragraph1: The decomposed CID so you can learn its meaning.

step5.title: Οπτική αναπαράσταση
step5.paragraph1: Μια οπτική αναπαράσταση του κόμβου και των στοιχείων του.

errors.BlockFetchTimeoutError: Failed to fetch content in {timeout}s. Please refresh the page to retry or try a different CID.
errors.BlockFetchError: Failed to fetch content: {error}. This could mean the content is not available on the network or there are connectivity issues.
errors.CidSyntaxError: Invalid CID format: {cid}. Please ensure you are using a valid CID.
errors.checkIpfsNetwork: Check content availability on IPFS Network

troubleshootingTips.title: Troubleshooting Tips
troubleshootingTips.tryLater: Try again later - the content may still be propagating through the network
troubleshootingTips.checkCidSyntax: Verify that your CID is formatted correctly or that your CAR file is valid
